title: Riot can we please try 5 bans per team? Maybe even 4?
body:
Honestly, sometimes I kinda want to see other comps in LCS instead of the same 5 junglers and Sivir/Lucian/Ashe botlane. Think of all the potential underused comps that people could play and not just go for the strongest picks.

Also, all the bans would leave breathing room for the other 100 champions to be played in competitive and dynamic que.

replies.body:
Its simple.

Do a Lottery system for banning.

How Banning works:

First 30 seconds of Champion Select - ALL players select a single champ to ban. If you dont wanna ban anyone, you're not  forced to. 

After 30 seconds, bans from both teams are revealed. If there are duplicate bans (eg both teams ban Vlad) Nothing happens, vlad is banned. There will be different AMOUNT of bans per game, with a maximum of 10 bans if every player selects a unique champ. 

This way EVERYONE has a ban choice in chap select, there will a variable number of bans per game (so its not fixed 6 or 10 or whatever), 
and champ select will be MUCH SHORTER because everyone bans at the same time, instead of one after the other. 

let me know if you guys think that is a good banning system, or we should stick with what we have.

In my opinion they should merge pick and ban into one process. This way the team could react to picks during the whole pick and ban phase not just at the begin.

Not sure why you think it would increase diversity. If all the Tier 1 picks were banned, then all that would is that Tier 2 picks would become picked. And when those get banned or changed, they'll jump right to the next tier. It wouldn't be diversity, it'd just be forcing some champions to be permabanned and the next strongest picks to be permapicked.
Banning is always "ban the demigods of the patch". If I banned an uncommon pick because of how well they counter me instead of a demigod then the match would suck for everyone.

> Also, all the bans would leave breathing room for the other 100 champions to be played in competitive and dynamic que.

There would be plenty of breathing room for the other 121 champions in the game, even if we had 10 bans. I think Ghostcrawler answered a question about increasing the number of bans on an Ask Riot post a few months ago. I believe he said something ridiculous about not wanting to increase the number of bans at this moment because it would hurt role diversity. Which is again, absolutely ridiculous seeing as how there are over 130 champions in the game. But don't worry man, I'm pretty sure he also mentioned that while they have no intention of increasing the number of bans at this moment, they are "exploring the idea". We'll have those extra bans faster than you can say "nerf Irelia".
Im for having 5 bans but please make it somehow be short, the ban process and picking already takes a very long time. Especially with last minute drops and then it starts all over again.
